translations: v.播种；移植（plant 的 ing 形式）；安置

phrs.translation: 造林地；种植范围，造林面积

sentences.sentence: Soil erosion was mitigated by the planting of trees.
sentences.translation: 植树造林减轻了土壤侵蚀。

sentences.sentence: Recently much of their energy has gone into planting a large vegetable garden.
sentences.translation: 最近，他们的大部分精力已经花在种植一个大型蔬菜园上。
